public class Tester {
	public static void main (String[] args){
		static ListI<Integer> List = new LinkedList <Integer>(); // ListIλ” μΈν„°νμ΄μ¤
		int n=10;

		// μ—°κ²° λ¦¬μ¤νΈλ¥Ό μ κ±°ν•λ‹¤.
		for(int i=n-1; i>=0; i--)

	}
}

κ°μ²΄μ—μ„ λ‘ λ²μ§Έ λ°©μ‹μΌλ΅ λ°λ³µλ¬Έμ΄ λ™μ‘ν•λ„λ΅ ν•κΈ° μ„ν•΄μ„λ” Iterator μΈν„°νμ΄μ¤λ¥Ό κµ¬ν„ν•΄μ•Ό ν•λ‹¤.

public Iterator<E> iterator(){
	return new IteratorHelper();
}

public class LinkedList<E> implements ListI<E>{
	class IteratorHelper implements Iterator<E>{
		Node<E> index;
		public IteratorHelper(){
			index=head;
		}
		public boolean hasNext(){
			return (index != null)
		}
		public E next(){
			if (!hasNext())
				throw new NoSuchElementException();
			E val = index.data;
			index = index.next;
			return val;
		}
	}
}

remove

public E remove(E obj){
	Node<E> current = head;
	Node<E> previous = null;
	while(current != null) {
		if (((Comparable<E>) obj).compareTo(current.data)==0) { // 1. find
			if (current==head) // λ…Έλ“κ°€ 1κ° or μ²« λ²μ§Έ λ…Έλ“ μ κ±°
				return removeFirst();
			if (current==tail) // λ§μ§€λ§‰ λ…Έλ“ μ κ±°
				return removeLast();
			// μ¤‘κ°„ λ…Έλ“ μ κ±°
			currentSize--;
			previous.next=current.next; // 2. remove
			return current.data;
			}
		// μ°Ύκ³ μ ν•λ” μ”μ†κ°€ μ•„λ‹λ©΄
		previous = current;
		current = current.next;
	}
	return null;
}

public boolean contains(E obj){
	Node<E> current = head;
	while(current != null) {
		if (((Comparable<E>) obj).compareTo(current.data)==0) // Comparable μΈν„°νμ΄μ¤
			return true;
		current = current.next;
	}
	return false;
}

public E peekFirst(){
	if (head == null)
		return null;
	return head.data;
}

public E peekLast(){
	if (tail == null)
		return null;
	return tail.data;
}
  • μ„μ‹ ν¬μΈν„°λ¥Ό ν™μ©ν•μ—¬ μ‹κ°„ λ³µμ΅λ„κ°€ O(n)O(n)O(n) μΈ peekLast ν•¨μλ¥Ό λ§λ“¤ μλ„ μλ‹¤.
public E peekLast(){
	Node<E> tmp = head;
	while(tmp.next != null)
		tmp = tmp.next;
	return tmp.data;
}
